function.name: activateBranch
function.brief: Set the branch status to 1 and activate the branch branch.
function.doc: Set the branch status to 1 and activate the branch branch. This will cause the branch to be red by a call to ROOT::TreeWrapper::next. If this branch has any sub-branches, they will also be activated (useful if branch points to a complex object and the branch has a split-mode greater than 0).

argument.name: branch
argument.doc: the branch to activate. Must not be null.
